name: Nowarshiba
description: NoWarShiba is a meme cryptocurrency token operating on Binance Smart Chain. Nowarshiba is different from other typical meme tokens because the team is doxxed and based in Korea. We use 2 percent of the transaction tax as marketing funds, and we also use it as another part of Ukraine's war zone. It's a rally of support for the war or for the underprivileged.
